de.griefed.monitoring.components

Class RamComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.griefed.monitoring.components.RamComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InformationModel

    @Service
public class RamComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements InformationModel
    Class responsible for retrieving all interesting values about the memory.

        public java.lang.String getValue()
        Getter for the information about the memory. Gathers information about the total available memory, free memory and, if applicable, gathers additional information about the physical memory sticks bank, capacity and type.
